title: Signed T206 Card Available - Now With Image
author: btcarfagno

posts.post_title: Signed T206 Card Available - Now With Image
posts.post_content:
I am making available a signed T206 Fred Parent. The card has been graded 30 by SGC and the autograph certed by JSA. Please PM me with offers or for info.

I also will make available a signed T205 Bill Carrigan which has been encapsulated by BVG and certed by JSA.

Thanks for looking!

Tom C

[IMG]http://i792.photobucket.com/albums/yy203/collectiblesgains/signedtcards_zpsb56e63f0.jpg[/IMG]

Can you please email me a photo of the T206 and price to [url]ekramer421@gmail.com[/url]


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk

Bump with image of the cards available. Looking to sell one or the other but not both.

Tom C
Can't wait to get the Parent. Thank you again!
